Characteristic.name: Alert Notification Control Point

InformativeText.Abstract: Control point of the Alert Notification server. Client can write the command here to request the several functions toward the server.
InformativeText.Summary: The 1st octet value of the characteristic is an unsigned 8 bit integer that has a fixed point exponent of 0. The 1st octet value expresses the command ID that defines the server's actions. The 2nd octet value of the characteristic is an "Alert Category ID" format. This octet shows the target category that the command ID applies for.

Examples.Example: The data 0x02 0x01 interprets "Disable New Incoming Notification for Email Category".

Field.name: Category ID
Field.InformativeText: Target category that the command applies to.

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
